DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_15_03: My name is Marvin. I need to talk to you.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_03_04: And I need to talk with the ladies here. Why should I give my time to you?
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_15_05: That's because it won't take much time. I am training in the art of blacksmithing and I heard that you are in possession of a book that could help me a lot.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_03_06: Yes, I have it, but I'm not giving it back. Is that all?
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_Weapon_15_01: If you give it to me, I'll make you a decent weapon.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_Weapon_03_02: I doubt you can beat our blacksmith. Thank you.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_Pay_15_01: I'll pay you for that book.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_Pay_03_02: I don't think you have enough to convince to part with such a good tome.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_Fight_03_02: In the brothel? A place of culture? Not a chance.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_15_01: What do you want in return for it?
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_02: Good question. Well, actually... nothing. It has the most value to me.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_15_03: Oh, come on. I'm sure you're willing to give it up for something.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_07: Well, let me think about it.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_08: Hmm... as a guard, maybe you could be useful...
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_04: Hmm... what use would I have of you anyway? What do you do?
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_06: A guard? Well... then I guess we can make a deal.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_10: I'd like to check one thing in the sewers. As a guard, you could be useful to me.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_15_11: In the sewers? And what can be checked in the sewers?
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_12: I've heard this one urban legend. Supposedly there lives a creature that kidnaps townspeople and gathers their valuables in its nest.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_13: We, the people of Wolf's Den, like to check out stories like this. There's always some chance that they're true and we can have an interesting adventure.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_14: You're a guard, so if I meet someone inside I won't have any problems. Because as far as I know, not many people have access to the sewers?
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_15_15: Yes. Admittedly, I've never heard of such a monster, but if you want it in exchange for a book, fine. I'll help you.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Hello_What_03_16: So we have a deal. I'll be waiting for you at the sewer entrance in the Artisan's District. I'll see you there.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Ready_03_03: Great, lets get this over with. Go ahead!
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Ready_03_02: Put on one of your fancy armors, so that from a distance it is clear that you are a guard!
DIA_Gamal_QM305_ExitSewers_03_01: Eh, of course, as with most legends, they're made up.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_ExitSewers_03_03: Sure, I'll give it to you right now. Let's just go somewhere civilized.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Thanks_03_01: Well, here we are. Where did I... Oh, yes, here. 'The Nordmarians' Mastery'. I part with her with a heavy heart, but a deal's a deal.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Thanks_15_02: Thanks. Enjoy your stay in town.
DIA_Gamal_QM305_Thanks_03_03: Oh yeah, it'll be nice. I still have a few girls left here to meet!
DIA_Gamal_Ambient_03_01: Nice women you got here, so not bad. Are we finally going into those sewers?
DIA_Gamal_Ambient_03_02: Not now. We have work to do.
DIA_Gamal_Ambient_03_03: I kind of regret that this urban legend of yours was literally crap, but life apparently is like that. I'll find something else to do.
